name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: YouTube Hider - Remove Comments By Keywords, Usernames & Tools

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Eliminate Shorts & video suggestions by title keywords, channels, and more tools for a peaceful YouTube experience with no toxicity.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your YouTube viewing into a distraction-free zone with our powerful Chrome extension. 

FEATURED HIGHLIGHTS:
⭐ Hide Comments with Keywords: Automatically hide comments that contain specific words.
⭐ Hide View Count: Remove the view count from YouTube videos.
⭐ Hide Comment Section: Hide the entire comment section, useful for kids.
⭐ Hide Specific Username’s Comments: Block comments from certain users.
⌛ Hide Suggested Videos: (Coming Soon) Hide video suggestions with specific keywords in the title or channel name.
⌛ Hide YouTube Shorts: (Coming Soon) Remove YouTube Shorts from your feed.

ELIMINATE ANNOYING COMMENTS LIKE:
❌ "First!", "Is anyone else watching this in 2024?", "Who’s here from TikTok?", "Any keywords you want..."

NO MORE COMMENTS BY SPECIFIC USERNAMES:
❌ You will no longer have to see unpleasant or toxic comments from anyone you choose in the future.

HOW TO USE:
1️⃣ Click the "Add to Chrome" button to install.
2️⃣ After installation, click the extension icon.
3️⃣ Add your unwanted keywords, usernames in the pop-up and reload the page to see a cleaner comments section.

HIDE VIEW COUNT:
✔️ Reduce Pressure, Focus on Content, Avoid Bias.

HIDE COMMENT SECTION:
✔️ Protect Kids, Avoid Negative Interactions, Minimize Screen Time.

💡 Bugs? Improvement ideas? Feel free to message me. Click the "Feedback" button in the extension's pop-up to share your thoughts.
💡 Sometimes YouTube updates their interface, and our extension may not work well. Please report to us, and the issues will be fixed promptly.
